text: so the nurses… I went to the medical centre to get food, because back then they gave us food, it was called PANFAR. So I decided to go because
If you get ligated then we will keep on giving to you, if not no.   So the

and I had to, I left my boy who was 6 months, I left him with another man, because he was with his wife who had also been ligated already. So I left my child there so that he could look after him and I went inside. I was the last one.
